data.actual_result: Discord Crashes and displays a button to reload it.
data.expected_result: Going back to where you were and simply not uploading anything.
data.short_description: Trying to upload a second File in a row but cancelling instead Crashes Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel/DM and upload 1 file - Stay in that same Channel/DM - Click the file uploader button again - Click Cancel/X instead of uploading a second file.
